dTable.apI_QUESTION: give me shipped quantities by customer
dTable.sql_text:
SELECT 
    SHIPMENT_CUSTOMER,
    SUM(SHIPMENT_QTY) AS TOTAL_SHIPPED_QTY
FROM 
    SHIPMENT_HISTORY_DETAILS
GROUP BY 
    SHIPMENT_CUSTOMER;

dTable.apI_QUESTION: GIVE ME SHIPPED QUANTITIES BY QUARTER, CUSTOMER,PRODUCT FOR THE LAST 3 QUARTERS BASED ON SHIPPED DATE'S DATE PORTION
dTable.sql_text:
SELECT 
    c.YEAR,
    c.QUARTER,
    s.SHIPMENT_CUSTOMER,
    p.PRODUCT_NAME,
    SUM(s.SHIPMENT_QTY) AS TOTAL_SHIPPED_QTY
FROM 
    SHIPMENT_HISTORY_DETAILS s
JOIN 
    CALENDAR_DATA c ON CONVERT(date, s.SHIPMENT_DATE) = c.CALENDAR_DATE
JOIN 
    COMPLETED_LOT_DETAILS cl ON s.LOTID = cl.LOTID
JOIN 
    PRODUCT p ON cl.PRODUCTID = p.PRODUCTID
WHERE 
    c.CALENDAR_DATE >= DATEADD(QUARTER, -3, GETDATE())
GROUP BY 
    c.YEAR,
    c.QUARTER,
    s.SHIPMENT_CUSTOMER,
    p.PRODUCT_NAME
ORDER BY 
    c.YEAR DESC,
    c.QUARTER DESC,
    s.SHIPMENT_CUSTOMER,
    p.PRODUCT_NAME;

dTable.apI_QUESTION: give me lots that are shipped in last 5 days with total defect quantity for the lots is > 10 and their lot start and shipped quantity
dTable.sql_text:
SELECT 
    shd.LOTID,
    cld.START_QTY,
    shd.SHIPMENT_QTY,
    SUM(dhid.DEFECT_QTY) AS TOTAL_DEFECT_QTY
FROM 
    SHIPMENT_HISTORY_DETAILS shd
JOIN 
    COMPLETED_LOT_DETAILS cld ON shd.LOTID = cld.LOTID
JOIN 
    DEFECT_HISTORY_HEADER_DETAILS dhhd ON shd.LOTID = dhhd.LOTID
JOIN 
    DEFECT_HISTORY_ITEM_DETAILS dhid ON dhhd.DEFECT_HISTORY_HEADER_DETAILSID = dhid.DEFECT_HISTORY_HEADER_DETAILSID
WHERE 
    shd.SHIPMENT_DATE >= DATEADD(day, -5, GETDATE())
GROUP BY 
    shd.LOTID, cld.START_QTY, shd.SHIPMENT_QTY
HAVING 
    SUM(dhid.DEFECT_QTY) > 10;

dTable.apI_QUESTION: what is cycletime by operation group
dTable.sql_text: SELECT    YIELD_BY,    OPERATION_GROUP_NAME,    CYCLETIMEFROM    CYCLETIME_BY_OPERATION_GROUP;
SELECT    YIELD_BY,    PRODUCT_NAME,    CYCLETIMEFROM     CYCLETIME_BY_PRODUCT;
